findings.details: Viewport meta and skip-link checked in default layout.
Main landmark uses aria-label to avoid broken aria-labelledby references across mixed layouts.
Regex scan for duplicated protocol and placeholder domains/markers.
Checks markdown links ](/path/), Liquid href/src {{ "/path/" | relative_url }}, and {% link ... %} targets.
Enable with --http-check to sample external URLs.
default.html contains {% seo %}; _config.yml includes core SEO keys.
Formspree preconnect is restricted to contact pages to reduce unnecessary third-party handshakes.
Homepage avatar uses hero preload flag and eager/high fetch priority to reduce above-the-fold delays.
Homepage hero image provides srcset/sizes variants to avoid over-downloading on mobile.
theme.js is deferred without preload to avoid competing with render-critical CSS/image downloads.
Detected 256 http(s) links across scanned files.
Posts/blog entries with front matter image now include image_width/image_height to reduce layout shift.

recommendations: Run this audit after each content batch and fix any placeholder/malformed links.
Run with --http-check periodically (or in CI) to validate sampled external URL reachability.
